mapper.select: SELECT N.notice_id AS noticeId, N.notice_category AS category, N.title, NR.opened, NR.created_at AS createdAt FROM notice N JOIN notice_receive NR ON N.notice_id = NR.notice_id WHERE NR.user_id = #{userId} ORDER BY noticeId DESC LIMIT #{startIdx},#{size}
SELECT COUNT(nr.notice_id) AS noticeCnt, COUNT(CASE WHEN nr.opened = 0 THEN nr.notice_id END) AS unreadNoticeCnt FROM notice_receive nr WHERE nr.user_id = #{userId}
